about.title: Curious about me? Here you have it:
content: I am a passionate full-stack web developer with experience in both frontend and backend development.
I specialize in modern technologies like Vue.js, React, Laravel, and Node.js, focusing on building scalable and maintainable web applications.
Over the years, I have worked on various projects involving RESTful APIs, responsive design, and real-time data handling.
I enjoy combining clean code with beautiful UI using tools like Tailwind CSS and component-driven development.
I am also exploring cloud platforms and tools such as Supabase and Firebase to enhance app performance and scalability.
Continuous learning and improving my craft is at the heart of my work as a developer.
